text: Mercy is a 2000 American erotic mystery thriller movie directed by Damian Harris and was based on the novel by David L. Lindsey. It stars Ellen Barkin, Wendy Crewson, Peta Wilson, Karen Young, Julian Sands, Stephen Baldwin, Beau Starr, Marshall Bell and was distributed by Franchise Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 thriller movies Category:2000s mystery movies Category:2000s erotic movies Category:2000 LGBT movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Damian Harris Category:Movies set in Toronto Category:Movies set in Houston
title: Mercy (2000 movie)
